We are A Customs Brokerage (ACB), a family-owned and operated global logistics solutions provider, offering concierge service to our clients. ACB was named a South Florida Top Workplaces for 2020 by our employees for a second year. We believe in a culture of continuous training and development, collaboration amongst teams, and loving what you do every single day.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”GothamBook||||||||” text_text_color=”#303030″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_3_font=”Montserrat|600|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#303030″ header_3_font_size=”20px” header_3_line_height=”1.2em” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_3_font_size_tablet=”17px” header_3_font_size_phone=”16px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our ideal candidates:

You are passionate about your work and dedicated to growth, you view challenges as an opportunity and enjoy learning. You are someone who enjoys building trust with your clients, collaborating with your peers, and committing to excellence.
